volume.name: No Need for Tenchi! Part Seven
Dragonslippers: This Is What an Abusive Relationship Looks Like

description: Translates : Uncanny Avengers (2013) #11 , A+X (2013) #12 , Avengers Arena (2013) #14

SKETCH MAGAZINE #40 featuring David Petersen creator of Mouse Guard. David discusses Mouse Guards growth to being one of comics most popular creator owned series.

Sketch continues to satisfies with numerous “how-to” instructional from tried-and-true industry talent, and is packed with penciling, computer coloring, and marketing tips to help you become an artistic rising star. Great information, inspiration, and fun!

Sketch Magazine returns! In Part 1 of a 2-part interview Alex Ross discusses his daily routine of working from a home studio. Then, we move into his methods of creating some of his modern day iconic comic book masterpieces and how he believes today's publishers could bring a better product to the consumer.Sketch continues to satisfy with numerous 'how-to' instruction from tried-and-true industry talent, and is packed with penciling, computer coloring, and marketing tips to help you become an artistic rising star.

Alex Ross discusses his daily routine of working from a home studio. They move into his methods of creating some on modern days iconic comic book masterpieces and how he believes today's publishers could bring a better product to the consumer. Sketch continues to satisfy with numerous "how-to" instructional from tried-and-true industry talent, and is packed with penciling, computer coloring, and marketing tips to help you become an artistic rising star.

The next volume in Masamune Shirow's best-selling art book series is orbiting cyberspace and preparing to touch down onto bookstore shelves in late summer. This volume concentrates primarily on Shirow's character, robot, and vehicle designs for interactive games.

Shirow is world famous for being equally skilled and creative in the realms of computer-generated graphics and traditional drawing and painting. It is logical then that his unique and imaginative studies are among the most interesting being done in the high-tech game field.

With commentary in both English and Japanese, this new collection provides a fascinating insight into the creative process of one of Japan's premiere talents.

Dark Horse has sold over 30,000 copies of the first two volumes of Intron Depot.

Dark Horse has a complete line of merchandise based on Intron Depot including lunch boxes, statues, T-shirts, a CD-ROM, and more!
name: Bullets

description:
The 900 first copies are numbered and signed by the author.

You'll all love plunging into the poetic and fabulous Sketchbook Varanda . The artist of Tales of the Dragon Guard , The Bloodline Chronicles and Petit Pierrot here reveals the full palette of his talent. Sketches and illustrations show the way to rediscover the energy, the sensitivity and the finesse of this master of the ink’s style.
name: Vol. 1

description:
Talented but aimless Sakurai just can't find a place to belong. After trying (and failing at) one extracurricular activity after another, his life changes thanks to a chance encounter with lacrosse fanatic Toyoguchi, who thinks Sakurai has just what it takes to propel her girl's lacrosse team to victory! In the second round of the final tournament, the heated battle between underdog Fujioka and undefeated Choran becomes one-sided in Choran's favor. Sakurai's last-ditch plan to strike back has unintended consequences, and to claim victory, Toyoguchi may have to make the ultimate sacrifice. Win or lose, when the final whisle blows, nothing will be the same for the character of Cross Manage!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 35: Even If It Was Just Luck
  • Chapter 36: Send Me Out
  • Chapter 37: I Sent Her Out
  • Chapter 38: Same Feeling
  • Chapter 39: What It Means to Win
  • Chapter 40: So This Is Your Lacrosse
  • Chapter 41: I Won't Lose
  • Final Chapter: What I Was Looking For
  • Extra Chapter: Summer Training
name: What I Was Looking For

first_appearance_teams.name: Fujioka High School Girls' Lacrosse Team

team_credits.name: Fujioka High School Girls' Lacrosse Team

description: We all know the Teen Titans are great at throwing "hat parties" and "meatball parties"...but can they throw a regular ol' "party party?" Don't miss who's on the guess list!
name: Party Party!

description: Maude’s arrival in Mystic Falls in the fall of 2013 has added complications to the already stormy relationship between Elena and Katherine. Whose philosophy will prevail as they end Stefan’s former lover’s reign of terror?
name: Mad Maude Part 2 of 2

description: Rob and May reach an unforeseen milestone in their relationship, but that's nothing compared to his chance encounter with the eccentric co-star of one of his favorite childhood TV shows. Uncomfortable hugs, inappropriate cabbies, obese Klingons, and really creepy puppets flesh out the third issue of BOB FINGERMAN's so-real-it-hurts series.
Translate : Wolverine e gli X-Men (2011) #21 , Wolverine (2013) #09

volume.name: Patrick in A Teddy Bear's Picnic and Other Stories
No Need for Tenchi! Part Seven
Sherlock Holmes: A Case of Blind Fear
Silly Lilly and the Four Seasons
Pat Wilton and His Flying Fortress

description:
Ali Baba and the 40 Thieves

From the famed tales of 1001 Nights, Ali Baba & the 40 Thieves is the famous story featuring Ali Baba & Marjaneh as they take on Tabnak and his gang of 40 thieves! Experience "Open Sesame" all over again with this brand new comic book, illustrated by a talented team of artists.
name: Ali Baba and the 40 Thieves

description:
Meet Ultra-Teen: Chuck's new superhero creation. He's super fast, super strong, and he's got x-ray vision! He only uses his powers for good -- but can too much good be a bad thing? Find out if Ultra-Teen's goody two shoes behavior can save the day -- and save his friendships -- in this super lead story!

Note: The digital edition (3/12/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.
name: Ultra-Teen

description: After crudely dismissing the talk of local terrors, Chito ventures home late at night only to find himself caught in the clutches of "El Cadejos" (The Black Devil Dog) and spellbound by "La LLorona" (The Weeping Woman.)
name: Chapter 2

description: A Bloody Frontier Adventure!--Chapter 5: Scylla and Charybdis. With the crew of the New Orleans being held captive by the pirates on Wolf Island, Young must make a terrible bargain to save them. But how will they all save themselves when the island itself begins to sink in the aftermath of another earthquake? Terrible sacrifices, bitter betrayals, swashbuckling river battles and a giant whirlpool all make this penultimate chapter of the bloody frontier adventure the most exciting installment yet!
name: Scylla and Charybdis

description: TWO DAREDEVILS (for the price of one)!

Gist Miller and other crewmembers of the salvage trawler, Monte Cristo, fight their way through a barrage of supernatural foes hell-bent on stealing the bodies of the living. But as they search for a means of escape, Hell's arsenal is unleashed from the deck of a sixty-three year old ghost ship that won't stop until it has them. Through fire, smoke, and the murky depths of the Triangle, Gist is startled to find what's been waiting for him.

A trio of noble sisters, all mighty mages and steam-tech experts, use their wits and combat savvy to aid their teammates in a dungeon quest gone horribly wrong. Then they must face a smug emperor and his warrior hordes in a Colosseum of Carnage!

Rod Espinosa, steampunk story-weaver extraordinaire, forges a world of grand adventure, where magic and mechanisms mix marvelously!

Note: The digital edition (3/12/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.

SPECIAL DOUBLE-ISSUE FINALE! Canisius descends into the underworld to demand that Pluto, the god of the dead, tell him how he can rid himself of his lupine curse. But there Canisius also learns that Lucius plans to give Lavinia the same curse. Reliving the legend of Romulus and Remus, Canisius must confront his former brother-in-arms and save both the city and the woman he loves. This is the thrilling double-sized conclusion to the epic series, Empire of the Wolf!

Tales of Rawr 2/ United

In this issue the poop hits the fan royally! Will the good guys win? Will they not win? Do they get bored and go out for slushies?! Find out in the thrilling conclusion to this particular story!
name: Tales of Rawr 2; United

description: A run in with a bounty hunter makes Zakk rethink his decision to dump Kyouri on a space station. Then it's off to the galactic capital, Nu-Nu-Earth, for her important meeting with the Galactic Broadcasting Corporation, what could go wrong? Everything!

volume.name: The Intergalactic Adventures of Zakk Ridley

description:
Long Walk Home

Colby struggles to carry the mysterious girl to safety, but the weather worsens with every step. Will the storm claim them both?
name: Chapter 8: Places Beyond

volume.name: Makeshift Miracle: The Girl From Nowhere

description:
The Misfits get into more trouble.

Demonman has found an ingenious way to impress a girl he likes - go on a double-date with a telepath who just joined the Misfits so he can get inside info on what's going on in the girl's mind.

Introducing the Misfits' newest member - Telex!
name: Telex

description: Things go from bad to...deadly. With great power also comes a great deal of death and destruction. He's been given a new lease on life, but Marshall can't stop killing. A horror romance story like nothing else you've ever read.

volume.name: Necrotic: Dead Flesh On A Living Body

description: Balthazar faces Baal in a deadly confrontation from which only one can emerge alive, while Thermidor falls around them. Terrible, inutterable truths are discovered which scatter the surviving characters to the winds, buffeted about by forces beyond their control, their fates changed forever!

THE SACRED BLADE

Powerful advisors from all over the Continent gather in Housman for the top secret "Valbanill Meetings." The inhuman Valbanill will soon break free from its prison, unless the Sacred Blade can be forged anew. All eyes are on Luke, as he is the only blacksmith who knows the secret technique of forging a katana, passed down through the centuries from father to son.

Meanwhile, Cecily battles her own feelings for Luke, as she learns more about his tragic past and the cause of his unwavering duty. Can Luke overcome his grief and finally become the Sacred Blacksmith he is destined to be?

Note: The digital edition (3/12/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.
name: Vol. 4

description: While the Shadow stalks the city's streets and subway, an ancient foe prepares to attack. But that's not all the Shadow has to worry about, a zealous religious group that follows the light is on the rise and the city of New York as never been in more danger.
name: Shadows and Light Part 3: Burning Apostles

description:
The SHATTERED WORLD CRISIS continues! "The Chase" Part One: Uncle Chuck and Professor Pickle -- CAPTURED by the nefarious Dr. Eggman! It's up to Sonic and the Freedom Fighters to secure the precious kidnapped cargo from the Egg Train! But they're going to be in for the surprise of their lives when they discover that there are more than just badniks guarding it!

Note: The digital edition (3/12/2014) for this issue was released before the print edition.
name: The Chase: Part One

description: In this penultimate chapter: the exorcism of Amanda Marino! Armed with the Ring of Solomon, Doctor Xander Crowe enters Amanda's tortured psyche to trap his old nemesis - the demon Adramelech! But: as the final truth is revealed, Sparrow & Crowe discover that nothing is what it seems - and a deal with the devil is only as good as the devil's word.

Check out behind the scenes of this cult classic all ages story featuring Comedian Steve Harvey and crimestopper Roopster Roux once again bring justice to their town by fighting a new threat-Victor Vain. Convinced the world would be a better place if everyone looked exactly like him, Vain has turned Woodville citizens into the spitting image of himself! It's up to Steve Harvey and Roopster Roux to stop Vain and his sidekick, Cheesecake, and return Woodville to normal. See branmd new character designs as well as never before seen images!

volume.name: Steve Harvey Presents: The Adventures of Roopster Roux

description: Tina and Gina re-plot their tactics after a devastating battle with a Dark Witch who threatens the town, while local police start to suspect sinister forces at work.

During the 1960's, Grant Worth's ability to control machines made him a legendary figure in Detroit. But when Worth's powers become obsolete because of society's own progress, he is forced to discover what happens when a superhero can no longer be super...
name: Chapter II

description: From tears to soda fountains, from mobsters to pretty ingénues in freshly pressed dresses, the stories of love and betrayal herein will prompt you to grab a tissue box or swoon in delight. Featuring two of Joe Simon and Jack Kirby's sensational romance comics!

The Return

4th Hanzos journey begins after he returns home from months of training in the forest. His village begins to suffer from multiple attacks by a group of ronin thugs. It is up to 4th Hanzo and his clan to stop them!

Join 4th Hanzo and his clan as they embark on an incredible adventure!
name: The Return

description:
Curious about the Atomeka imprint at Titan Comics?

Wondering how Editor Dave Elliot has gathered so many astounding, creator-owned stories together in one place?

Here's your chance to sample pages, pin-ups and whole stories from 'A1 Annual' Vol. 1, 'Monster Massacre' Vol. 1 and Vol. 2, 'The Weirding Willows', 'Odyssey' and 'Carpe DIEm' - all available to purchase now on comiXology!

Over 100 pages of content!

Try Atomeka for FREE today!

volume.name: A1: The World's Greatest Comics - Free Digital Preview

description: Ignatz Award-winner Box Brown returns with a tale of surfing, rock 'n' roll, burritos and radness! Phoebe hopes to run a bit wild at the beach and learn to surf, and quickly meets Hank, a local surfer also looking for direction. Plus a backup featuring James Kochalka's cute mushroom characters!

Brought out of retirement, Brit is faced with a failing marriage, a new boss, an insecure partner and the return of... his sister? A new threat looms on the horizon that threatens to destroy the world. Brit will take it down, or die trying.

Collects BRIT #1-5.
name: Volume Two

description:
When a threat from another dimention threatens to destroy the world, BRIT must team up with all the heroes of the INVINCIBLE UNIVERSE to stop it. Guest starring Invincible, The Astounding Wolf-Man, Tech Jacket and many, MANY more!

Collects BRIT #7-12.
name: Volume Three

description:
In 1769, the court of Empress Maria Theresia witnessed one of that era's most amazing feats of engineering: a machine that could play chess. Artfully constructed by a Hungarian nobleman named Wolfgang von Kempelen, the chess-machine played a unique game against each opponent, far surpassing the abilities of all its fellow automata. Throughout its eighty-five year career, audiences across Europe

and the Americas flocked to see the mechanical marvel seemingly capable of human intelligence; Napoleon, Charles Babbage, and Benjamin Franklin were among its challengers, and Edgar Allen Poe wrote an essay attempting to explain how it worked. Despite its demise over a hundred fifty years ago, its mystery continues to fascinate, and its audience's reaction to its Orientalist trappings casts fresh light on our present sense of the 'exotic'.

Clockwork Game retells the true story of the world's first chess-playing automaton, blending reality and fiction into a singular graphic novel.

Note: The digital edition (3/12/2014) for this volume was released before the print edition.
name: GN

volume.name: Clockwork Game: The Illustrious Career of A Chess-Playing Automaton

description:
Tom Ferris lives in a world of costumes and wonder. Figures streaking across the sky, hurling themselves over rooftops at night. They are everywhere. They are common. But Tom doesn't notice that world anymore. His world is made up of spreadsheets, phone bills, software, coffee, collared shirts.

When a coworker takes an interest in Tom, a chain of events begins to unfold...
name: Part 1

description: The cult-hit, Manning Award-nominated miniseries gets collected with bonus content! When the Biblical apocalypse starts, charming bastard Bram Carlson is raptured into Heaven in a 'clerical error.' After he's sent back to Earth, Bram decides to cash in the end of the world for all it's worth! But can his anxious roommate Ben save his friend from himself-and the mounting forces of Armageddon? Check out the book the Onion's AVClub called 'hilarious' and IGN called 'an amazing series!'
name: TPB

volume.name: The End Times of Bram and Ben

description: Bluewater productions continues it's popular line of biography with The Fame: Adele written by Michael Troy with art by ? Learn the exciting path of the British power balladeer who took the world by storm and ruled the airwaves with mega hits like 'Chasing Pavements' and 'Someone Like You.' This edition is translated into Spanish.

May the odds be ever in Jennifer Lawrence's favor. Bluewater Productions popular line of biography comic books continues with The Fame: Jennifer Join writer Michael Troy and artist ? for an exploration of Jennifer's career from starring in successful X-men and Hunger Games franchises to winning a best actress Oscar for her celebrated role in Silver Lining's Playbook to American Hustle.

CCover CJaume Font?

One of the most influential and prominent family in American politics and government. From Camelot to the present, see the impact that the Ted Kennedy and the last child of the Kennedy dynasty has had in shaping the new America! This comic series has been featured on CNN, Fox News and Politco.
name: TPB

description: When the world's most dangerous chef hears a rumor about the world's last remaining supply of saffron, he and his entourage set off on a journey that culminates in their participation in an ostentatious, costumed tournament known as Gastronomo, where the coveted saffron is the theme ingredient.
